source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Create A Digital Photo Caricature from Scratch
items.headline: Learn how to use Photoshop to create digital photo caricature art.
objectives_summary: Basic Photoshop Skills
Basic Caricature Fundamentals
Digital Painting

items.title: Hand Embroidery: Painting with thread
items.headline: Hand Embroidery Fox: step by step guide for painting with thread
objectives_summary: Create a thread painting with a picture as reference.

items.title: Introduction to Ballpoint Pen Drawing
items.headline: Let's turn your doodles into masterpieces!
objectives_summary: Create well thought out illustrations using ballpoint pens.
Sketch with boldness and learn how to turn doodles into great drawing exercises.
Learn different rendering styles that can be achieved with ballpoint pens.

items.title: Watercolor Autumn Painting | Fall Leaves
items.headline: Create Fall Leaves with watercolors - Expand your skills and create a realistic Maple leaf painting
objectives_summary: Paint realistic Maple Leaf using watercolor
Create a simple Color chart with fall colors
Learn to expand on those colors by adding a Glaze to create more shades and depth.

items.title: Watercolor painting Koi by feng shui for attracting wealth

visible_instructors.name: Anna
visible_instructors.job_title: Customer service, process and service management expert
visible_instructors.title: Anna Yurchenko

items.headline: we will draw a watercolor painting with Koi that brings wealth and prosperity, place it at home according feng shui
objectives_summary: Watercolor techniques and secrets
Color pencil techniques
Features of drawing in mixed technique

items.title: Basic Crochet Stitches and Twisted Crochet Headband Project

visible_instructors.name: Rashmi
visible_instructors.job_title: Creative Designer, Crocheter. Loves making creative content.
visible_instructors.title: Rashmi (Kanika)

items.headline: Learn how to work basic crochet stitches, how to identify yarn ply, crochet a headband with a twist
objectives_summary: Basic Crochet Stitches required to work crochet projects like Slip Knot, Chains, Slip Stitch, Single Crochet, Double Crochet, Triple Crochet
Making of a Twisted Crochet Headband
Weaving the loose end after finishing a project

items.headline: Mandala Art Online Course By Swamini Kulkarni
objectives_summary: You can draw any kind of Mandala Designs
Get rid of your Stressful Life
You can create your own designs of Mandala

items.title: Learn how to create an Embird Sfumato Portrait Design

visible_instructors.name: Philip
visible_instructors.job_title: Building Contractor, Author, Coach & Software Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Philip Viljoen

visible_instructors.name: Jacqui
visible_instructors.job_title: Teaching Bernina Embroidery Software @ School of Digitizing
visible_instructors.title: Jacqui Viljoen

items.headline: Digitize an embroidery design in Sfumato stitch with Embird. Embird Sfumato Tutorials, David Kruiper Portrait Study
objectives_summary: Use Embird Sfumato tools
Create a Sfumato Portrait study from any photo
Know how to transfer a Sfumato design to Editor for fine tuning

items.title: Painting and Finishing Scale Plastic Models
items.headline: Learn how to turn your plastic model into a museum-worthy masterpiece.
objectives_summary: Paint and finish scale plastic models, with a variety of tools and materials

items.title: Advanced Class of Magazine Paper Collage- Pet Portraits
items.headline: A Mixed Media Class -Learn to make an animal collage using magazine paper as your paint.
objectives_summary: How to create a Pet Portrait of your pet, or animal, using magazine paper.
Understanding the different looks that will impact your collage.
What to consider with the color of the animal and the fur length.

items.title: Awesome Astronomy Coasters, Using Resin
items.headline: Creating resin-coated astronomy coasters, using real astronomical images or fantastical imaginary nebulae and stars.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create real astronomical image coasters, or imaginary space scenes and then coat them with food-safe robust resin to make totally unique and awesome gifts.

items.title: How To Draw Horses Step by Step - 4 Subjects in 1 Course
items.headline: Learn how to draw 4 horse pictures, 2 portraits and 2 landscapes. Get AMAZING results with Pastel Pencils
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 4 Horse Pictures
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

Learn how to use resin jewelry tools

items.headline: English
objectives_summary: What is tambour embroidery and what it is used for?
Assembling the hook and framing the fabric.
Basic stitch.

objectives_summary: Expressive Abstract Painting
